reasoning: Team A is looking to strengthen its RB and WR positions by acquiring Josh Jacobs, who has a higher projection than any RB being offered, and Zay Flowers, who has a strong projection and can bolster the WR lineup. Team B receives Nick Chubb and Miles Sanders, who can provide depth at RB, and Diontae Johnson, who can be a solid WR option. This trade balances both teams' needs and improves Team A's starting lineup.
